name: Mantle of the Magic Warriors
text: You weave golden masks shaped like animals around the targets’ faces, imbuing each target with an animal spirit that matches her strength of character. Each target gains one animal special ability of your choice granted by beast shape I. You can choose a different special ability for each target.
savingThrow_zh: 意志, 通过则无效 (无害)
text_zh: 你在目标的脸上编织出形状像动物的金色面具，为每个目标注入与她的性格强度相匹配的动物精魂。每个目标获得一种你选择的野兽形态I（beast shape I）赋予的动物特殊能力。你可以为每个目标选择不同的特殊能力。
